allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add visualization module with Bloch spheres, fractals, and phase analysis

- Create QA1/visualization/ module integrating A-Gate visualization tools
- Add Bloch sphere rendering for E/I qubits with entanglement display
- Add Julia set fractal generation from quantum state amplitudes
- Add interactive matplotlib explorer with real-time parameter sliders
- Add EEG-quantum visualization bridge for QDNU pipeline
- Add phase space analysis: fixed points, nullclines, RK4 integration
- Add parameter sweep figure \(Figure S3\) to paper
- Fix matrix formatting in Appendix A for GitHub markdown rendering
- Update A-Gate circuit figure styling

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
